TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SymmetricAlgorithm extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class SymmetricAlgorithm Implements IDisposable
public ref class SymmetricAlgorithm abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示抽象基底類別，對稱演算法之所有實作必須從它繼承。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of symmetric algorithms must inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別類別會使用稱為 cipher 區塊鏈結 (CBC)，鏈結模式，需要索引鍵 () 和初始化向量 ()，對資料執行密碼編譯轉換。The classes that derive from the class use a chaining mode called cipher block chaining (CBC), which requires a key () and an initialization vector () to perform cryptographic transformations on data. 若要解密資料加密使用其中一種類別，您必須設定屬性和屬性相同的值用來進行加密。To decrypt data that was encrypted using one of the classes, you must set the property and the property to the same values that were used for encryption. 才能發揮作用的對稱演算法，必須只能傳送者和收件者知道秘密金鑰。For a symmetric algorithm to be useful, the secret key must be known only to the sender and the receiver. ， ，和是對稱演算法的實作。, , , and are implementations of symmetric algorithms. 請注意，當使用衍生類別，它是不夠，從安全性觀點來看，只在您完成使用物件後，強制記憶體回收。Note that when using derived classes, it is not enough, from a security perspective, to simply force a garbage collection after you have finished using the object. 您必須明確呼叫零之前它會釋放此物件內的任何機密資料外之物件的方法。You must explicitly call the method on the object to zero out any sensitive data within the object before it is released. 請注意記憶體回收並不會清空回收物件的內容，但是只會將標示為可用於重新配置記憶體。Note that garbage collection does not zero out the contents of collected objects but simply marks the memory as available for reallocation. 因此記憶體回收物件中包含的資料可能仍會出現記憶體堆積中未配置的記憶體中。Thus the data contained within a garbage collected object may still be present in the memory heap in unallocated memory. 在密碼編譯物件，這項資料可能包含機密資訊，例如金鑰資料或純文字區塊。In the case of cryptographic objects, this data could contain sensitive information such as key data or a block of plain text. .NET Framework 中保存敏感性資料實作的所有密碼編譯類別`Clear`方法。All cryptographic classes in the .NET Framework that hold sensitive data implement a `Clear` method. 呼叫時，`Clear`方法會在物件內的所有敏感性資料加上零覆寫，並再釋放物件，使它可以安全地回收。When called, the `Clear` method overwrites all sensitive data within the object with zeros and then releases the object so that it can be safely garbage collected. 當物件具有歸零，而且發行時，您然後應該呼叫`Dispose`方法`disposing`參數設定為`True`來處置所有 managed 和 unmanaged 資源相關聯的物件。When the object has been zeroed and released, you should then call the `Dispose` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `True` to dispose of all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用類別具有指定屬性和初始化向量 () 來加密所指定的檔案`inName`，並將加密的結果所指定的檔案輸出至`outName`.The following code example uses the class with the specified property and initialization vector () to encrypt a file specified by `inName`, and outputs the encrypted result to the file specified by `outName`. `desKey`和`desIV`方法參數是 8 位元組陣列。The `desKey` and `desIV` parameters to the method are 8-byte arrays. 您必須先執行此範例安裝高度加密套件。You must have the high encryption pack installed to run this example. [!code-cpp[Classic CryptoStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CryptoStream Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CryptoStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CryptoStream Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CryptoStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CryptoStream Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Overridable Property BlockSize As Integer

summary.span: 取得或設定密碼編譯作業的區塊大小，以位元為單位。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.

value.span: 區塊大小，以位元為單位。

span.span: The block size, in bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 區塊大小是可以在一個作業中解密或加密資料的基本單位。The block size is the basic unit of data that can be encrypted or decrypted in one operation. 區塊大小超過訊息處理為連續區塊。訊息長度短於區塊大小必須以額外的位元區塊的大小。Messages longer than the block size are handled as successive blocks; messages shorter than the block size must be padded with extra bits to reach the size of a block. 無效的區塊大小取決於所用的對稱演算法。Valid block sizes are determined by the symmetric algorithm used.

span.span: The block size is invalid.

summary.span: 表示密碼編譯作業的區塊大小，以位元為單位。

span.span: Represents the block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 區塊大小是可以在一個作業中解密或加密資料的基本單位。The block size is the basic unit of data that can be encrypted or decrypted in one operation. 區塊大小超過訊息處理為連續區塊。訊息長度短於區塊大小必須以額外的位元區塊的大小。Messages longer than the block size are handled as successive blocks; messages shorter than the block size must be padded with extra bits to reach the size of a block. 無效的區塊大小取決於所用的對稱演算法。Valid block sizes are determined by the symmetric algorithm used. 這個欄位透過存取屬性。This field is accessed through the property.

summary.span: 將 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [總未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 清除。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定密碼編譯作業的回饋大小，以位元為單位。

span.span: Gets or sets the feedback size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.

value.span: 回饋大小，以位元為單位。

span.span: The feedback size in bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回饋大小會決定回饋給後續加密或解密作業的資料量。The feedback size determines the amount of data that is fed back to successive encryption or decryption operations. 回饋大小不能大於區塊大小。The feedback size cannot be greater than the block size.

exception.span: 回饋大小大於區塊大小。

span.span: The feedback size is larger than the block size.

summary.span: 表示密碼編譯作業的回饋大小，以位元為單位。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GenerateIV() cil managed

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，產生要用於該演算法的隨機初始化向量 ()。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, generates a random initialization vector () to use for the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情況下，沒有理由来使用這個方法，因為`CreateEncryptor()`或`CreateEncryptor(null, null)`自動產生初始化向量和索引鍵。In general, there is no reason to use this method, because `CreateEncryptor()` or `CreateEncryptor(null, null)` automatically generates both an initialization vector and a key. 不過，您可能想要使用方法，以重複使用不同的初始化向量的對稱演算法執行個體。However, you may want to use the method to reuse a symmetric algorithm instance with a different initialization vector.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GenerateKey() cil managed

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，產生要用於演算法的隨機金鑰 ()。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, generates a random key () to use for the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情況下，沒有理由来使用這個方法，因為`CreateEncryptor()`或`CreateEncryptor(null, null)`自動產生初始化向量和索引鍵。In general, there is no reason to use this method, because `CreateEncryptor()` or `CreateEncryptor(null, null)` automatically generates both an initialization vector and a key. 不過，您可能想要使用方法，以不同的索引鍵中重複使用對稱演算法的執行個體。However, you may want to use the method to reuse a symmetric algorithm instance with a different key.

span.span: Gets or sets the initialization vector () for the symmetric algorithm.
The initialization vector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會自動設定為新的隨機值每當您建立的新執行個體，其中的類別，或當您以手動方式呼叫方法。The property is automatically set to a new random value whenever you create a new instance of one of the classes or when you manually call the method. 大小屬性必須是相同屬性除以 8。The size of the property must be the same as the property divided by 8. 衍生自類別類別會使用稱為 cipher 區塊鏈結 (CBC)，鏈結模式，需要索引鍵和初始化向量，對資料執行密碼編譯轉換。The classes that derive from the class use a chaining mode called cipher block chaining (CBC), which requires a key and an initialization vector to perform cryptographic transformations on data. 若要解密資料加密使用其中一種類別，您必須設定屬性和屬性相同的值用來進行加密。To decrypt data that was encrypted using one of the classes, you must set the property and property to the same values that were used for encryption. 針對指定的私密金鑰*k*，不使用初始化向量的簡單區塊編碼器會將同一個純文字輸入的區塊加密成同一個加密文字輸出區塊。For a given secret key *k*, a simple block cipher that does not use an initialization vector will encrypt the same input block of plain text into the same output block of cipher text. 如果您的純文字資料流中有重複的區塊，將您的加密文字資料流中有重複的區塊。If you have duplicate blocks within your plain text stream, you will have duplicate blocks within your cipher text stream. 如果未經授權的使用者知道的純文字區塊的結構，他們可以使用該資訊破解已知的密碼文字區塊，並可能復原您的金鑰。If unauthorized users know anything about the structure of a block of your plain text, they can use that information to decipher the known cipher text block and possibly recover your key. 為了打擊這個問題，從上一個區塊的資訊被混合加密的下一個區塊的處理程序。To combat this problem, information from the previous block is mixed into the process of encrypting the next block. 因此，兩個相同的純文字區塊的輸出會不同。Thus, the output of two identical plain text blocks is different. 因為這項技術會使用先前的區塊來加密的下一個區塊，來加密資料的第一個區塊需要的初始化向量。Because this technique uses the previous block to encrypt the next block, an initialization vector is needed to encrypt the first block of data.

exception.span: 嘗試將初始化向量設定為 。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the initialization vector to .

exception.span: 嘗試將初始化向量設定為無效的大小。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the initialization vector to an invalid size.

summary.span: 表示對稱演算法的初始化向量 ()。

span.span: Represents the initialization vector () for the symmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位透過存取屬性。This field is accessed through the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定對稱演算法的祕密金鑰。

span.span: Gets or sets the secret key for the symmetric algorithm.

value.span: 對稱演算法所用的祕密金鑰。

span.span: The secret key to use for the symmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加密和解密，會使用之祕密金鑰。The secret key is used both for encryption and for decryption. 對稱演算法才會成功，必須只有寄件者和收件者知道的祕密金鑰。For a symmetric algorithm to be successful, the secret key must be known only to the sender and the receiver. 有效的金鑰大小由特定的對稱演算法實作，而且會列於屬性。The valid key sizes are specified by the particular symmetric algorithm implementation and are listed in the property. 如果這個屬性是`null`使用時，呼叫方法來建立新的隨機值。If this property is `null` when it is used, the method is called to create a new random value.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the key to .
The key size is invalid.

summary.span: 取得或設定對稱演算法中使用的填補模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding mode used in the symmetric algorithm.

value.span: 對稱演算法中使用的填補模式。

span.span: The padding mode used in the symmetric algorithm.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分的純文字訊息並非由一個完全填滿區塊的位元組數。Most plain text messages do not consist of a number of bytes that completely fill blocks. 通常，沒有足夠的位元組來填入最後一個區塊。Often, there are not enough bytes to fill the last block. 當發生這種情況時，填補字串加入至文字。When this happens, a padding string is added to the text. 例如，如果區塊長度為 64 位元，而最後一個區塊包含只有 40 位元，就會加入 24 位元的填補。For example, if the block length is 64 bits and the last block contains only 40 bits, 24 bits of padding are added. 請參閱列舉特定模式的描述。See the enumeration for a description of specific modes.

exception.span: 填補模式不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The padding mode is not one of the values.

summary.span: 表示對稱演算法中使用的填補模式。

span.span: Represents the padding mode used in the symmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分的純文字訊息並非由一個完全填滿區塊的位元組數。Most plain text messages do not consist of a number of bytes that completely fill blocks. 通常，沒有足夠的位元組來填入最後一個區塊。Often, there are not enough bytes to fill the last block. 當發生這種情況時，填補字串加入至文字。When this happens, a padding string is added to the text. 例如，如果區塊長度為 64 位元，而最後一個區塊包含只有 40 位元，就會加入 24 位元的填補。For example, if the block length is 64 bits and the last block contains only 40 bits, 24 bits of padding are added. 請參閱列舉特定模式的描述。See the enumeration for a description of specific modes. 這個欄位透過存取屬性。This field is accessed through the property.
